context.after: Once you have 500 followers, you can grow it organically. Starting out ‚Äç My Twitter account was created in 2009 but I barely used it in the last 11 years. I had about 100 people I was following but most of them were not active. I also had about 184 followers who were mainly friends. My main goal was 1) to find the quickest way to get to 500 followers and 2) to be active in tweeting and engaging with a tight circle.
